author: diguida
body:
# Summary of changes
## Run1 simulation
- Ideal: [76X_mcRun1_design_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/76X_mcRun1_design_v1): As [75X_mcRun1_design_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/75X_mcRun1_design_v2) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#diff/gts/76X_mcRun1_design_v1/75X_mcRun1_design_v2):
  - New Egamma regressions based on ECAL multifit reconstruction;
  - Removed unsupported Run1 SIM geometries.
- Realistic: [76X_mcRun1_realistic_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/76X_mcRun1_realistic_v1): As [75X_mcRun1_realistic_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/75X_mcRun1_realistic_v2) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#diff/gts/76X_mcRun1_realistic_v1/75X_mcRun1_realistic_v2):
  - New Egamma regressions based on ECAL multifit reconstruction;
  - Removed unsupported Run1 SIM geometries.
- Heavy Ion: [76X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/76X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v1): As [75X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/75X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v2) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#diff/gts/76X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v1/75X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v2):
  - New Egamma regressions based on ECAL multifit reconstruction;
  - Removed unsupported Run1 SIM geometries.
- Proton Lead: [76X_mcRun1_pA_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/76X_mcRun1_pA_v1): As [75X_mcRun1_pA_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/75X_mcRun1_pA_v2) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#diff/gts/76X_mcRun1_pA_v1/75X_mcRun1_pA_v2):
  - New Egamma regressions based on ECAL multifit reconstruction;
  - Removed unsupported Run1 SIM geometries.
## Run1 data
- Offline: [76X_dataRun1_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/76X_dataRun1_v1): As [75X_dataRun1_v4](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/75X_dataRun1_v4) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#diff/gts/76X_dataRun1_v1/75X_dataRun1_v4):
  - New Egamma regressions based on ECAL multifit reconstruction.
## Run2 simulation
- Ideal: [76X_mcRun2_design_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/76X_mcRun2_design_v1): As [75X_mcRun2_design_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/75X_mcRun2_design_v2) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#diff/gts/76X_mcRun2_design_v1/75X_mcRun2_design_v2):
  - New Egamma regressions based on ECAL multifit reconstruction;
  - Updated L1T menu for Stage1.
- Startup: [76X_mcRun2_startup_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/76X_mcRun2_startup_v1): As [75X_mcRun2_startup_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/75X_mcRun2_startup_v2) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#diff/gts/76X_mcRun2_startup_v1/75X_mcRun2_startup_v2):
  - New Egamma regressions based on ECAL multifit reconstruction.
- Asymptotic: [76X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/76X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v1): As [75X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/75X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v2) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#diff/gts/76X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v1/75X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v2):
  - New Egamma regressions based on ECAL multifit reconstruction;
  - Updated L1T menu for Stage1.
- Heavy Ion: [76X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/76X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v1): As [75X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/75X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v2) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#diff/gts/76X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v1/75X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v2):
  - New Egamma regressions based on ECAL multifit reconstruction.
## Run2 data
- Offline: [76X_dataRun2_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/76X_dataRun2_v1): As [75X_dataRun2_v4](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#list/gts/75X_dataRun2_v4) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/browser/#diff/gts/76X_dataRun2_v1/75X_dataRun2_v4):
  - New Egamma regressions based on ECAL multifit reconstruction.
title: New GT for all supported scenarios.
